overview: These stepmoms realize that their relationships with their stepsons are very important, and they're willing to do absolutely anything to develop a very special bond.  Marie McCray has been noticing her stepson's physique. She suggest they work out together and while stretching her leggings ripped right over her pussy! Exercise brought these 2 closer together!  Christie Stevens married her husband for his money and his son isn't too happy about it. Christie points out that if this is true, she needs someone to fuck. Suddenly, this arrangement isn't so bad.
title: Education of My Stepson
